name: TREC-ITP - B1101A - Te Ngarue Bridge - Basecourse Construction
template name: TREC-ITP - B1101A - Te Ngarue Bridge - Basecourse Construction

name: 1 - Installation of Erosion and Sediment Controls
Detail - Monitor effectiveness of the ESCP Controls throughout the construction process
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - All previous Activities completed & signed off before Placing base course
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Previous ITP must be completed (and site must not be dormant for extended period)
Detail - Set out pegs installed every 20m if required
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey

Detail - All aggregate loads coming to site to have delivery dockets checked to ensure material is coming from the correct stockpile. Site Engineer to keep a running tally of material delivered to site and docket number
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measurement and recording
Conformance Criteria - Traceability of all materials delivered to site
Records - Delivery Dockets, Aggregate Deliveries Register
Frequency - 1 sample/10,000m3 or 1 per source stockpile.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - PSD, Atterberg Limits, MDD, OMC and CBR
Conformance Criteria - Results to comply with specification
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - NDM Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - Avg. >= 98% MDD and Min. >= 95% MDD
Detail - Cross fall check, Surface shape check
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey check & Measurement
Conformance Criteria - The cross fall between 2 points more than 2m apart, transverse to the centreline, shall not depart from the design cross fall by more than 0.5%
○ No point of the surface shall vary more than 10mm over a 3m long straight edge
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection by Design Engineer after site sweeping
Conformance Criteria - The large and small aggregates are held in place and the matrix does not displace under normal trafficking or sweeping
Detail - Red pen mark up drawings to be included in QA file
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Drawings
